QuestData.Title: The Seat of the Triumvirate
QuestData.Description: Even with the Sigil of Awakening in hand, the Crown cannot save us until it is whole.$b$bThat is why we must enter the Seat of the Triumvirate, even knowing that L'ura awaits us there.$b$bThis is a dire task, one that I would not ask if it were not completely necessary.$b$bWe will descend together. Come.
QuestData.RewardText: This is grave news indeed. It would be wise to follow Alleria's lead from here.
